entries.message: An outage or maintenance window is affecting a subset of users in this region. Detailed outage information is available in the customer portal if this event is impacting your resources.

Our network engineers and upstream providers have stabilized the Silicon Valley network at the moment. Network connectivity in the region has returned, however our network engineers and upstream providers are still working together to ensure a permanent fix is being put into place to prevent further outages.
We are currently experiencing a partial outage in our Silicon Valley location. Our network engineers are actively working with our upstream providers to restore connectivity as quickly as possible.
